data.name: premium_feature
data.value: היא תכונת פרימיום, אתה יכול לקנות את הגרסה בתשלום כדי לתמוך במפתחים!

data.name: set_point_min_description
data.value: טמפרטורה מינימלית שבאפשרותך להגדיר עבור התרמוסטט שלך

data.name: set_point_max_description
data.value: טמפרטורה מיירבית שבאפשרותך להגדיר עבור התרמוסטט שלך

data.name: are_you_sure_clear_settings
data.value: אתה בטוח?? פעולה זו גם מאתחלת את כל הגדרות יישומון דף הבית, תידרש להוסיף אותם מחדש לאחר מכן..

data.value: אין אפשרות להסיר שרת המשמש כברירת מחדל

data.value: כדי להחיל את שינוי הגדרות השפה נדרשת הפעלה מחדש

data.name: error_timeout
data.value: הזמן המוקצה עבר או שאין חיבור

data.value: Unable to get all switches, please try again

data.value: Not a valid latitude or longitude

data.name: could_not_find_location
data.value: Could not find location, please try again.

data.name: geofence_error_recreateLocations
data.value: Due to changes on Geofencing, please recreate your locations

data.name: noSwitchSelected_explanation
data.value: For GeoFencing to have effect, a switch should be connected to an GeoFence

data.name: geofencing_disabled_no_enabled_fences
data.value: Geofencing disabled since no geofences are enabled

data.name: geofence_not_available
data.value: Geofence service is not available now

data.value: NFC is not supported on this device

data.value: Give this NFC a proper name.

data.value: For NFC to have effect, a switch should be linked to an NFC Tag

data.name: permission_config
data.value: Configure the Permissions for this app

data.name: permission_desc_storage
data.value: These storage permissions are needed for saving cache file, settings and save snapshots from the camera.

data.name: permission_desc_location
data.value: These location permissions are needed for Geofencing and to get the Wifi SSID\'s around you!

data.name: permission_desc_phone
data.value: These phone state permissions are needed for enabling notifications!

data.name: permission_desc_camera
data.value: These camera permissions are needed for scanning QR Codes!

data.name: permission_desc_audio
data.value: These audio permissions are needed for Voice Recognition!

data.name: permission_desc_finger
data.value: These fingerprint permissions are needed for enabling Fingerprint Security!

data.name: qrcode_not_supported
data.value: QR Code is not supported on this device

data.name: qrcode_name
data.value: Give this QR Code a proper name.

data.name: qrcode_new_found
data.value: New QR Code detected, please setup via settings.

data.name: qr_code_disabled
data.value: QR Code disabled, please setup via settings.

data.name: noSwitchSelected_explanation_qrcode
data.value: For QR Code Scan to have effect, a switch should be linked to an QR Code

data.name: permission_camera_rationale
data.value: Access to the camera is needed for detection

data.name: low_storage_error
data.value: QR Code dependencies cannot be downloaded due to low device storage

data.name: no_camera_permission
data.value: This application cannot run because it does not have the camera permission. The application will now exit.

data.name: security_wrong_password_fingerprint
data.value: Wrong password entered, your OOTT account password is the failover for your fingerprint...!

data.name: always_on_off
data.value: Don\'t lock the screen to always On

data.name: custom_wear_select_desc
data.value: Select which switches you like to see on your Android Wear device

data.name: set_talk_back_on
data.value: Let OOTT talk back to you

data.name: setup_fingerprints
data.value: Setup fingerprints via Android Settings screens

data.name: fingerprint_not_supported
data.value: Fingerprint Security is not supported on this device

data.name: fingerprint_not_setup_in_android
data.value: First configure/connect a Fingerprint to this device

data.name: fingerprint_sure
data.value: Are you sure? The failover password is the password of your OOTT account.

data.name: widget_description
data.value: Enable or Disable Widget on this device

data.name: widget_disabled
data.value: Widgets are not enabled on this device, please check your settings of OOTT

data.name: widget_warning
data.value: Please use widgets on your own risk!! Widgets are currently in Beta stage and probably contain certain bugs. It can cause large data / battery usage...

data.value: Suppress specific Notifications on this device

data.value: Sound an Alarm for specific Notifications

data.value: Number of seconds to time the alarm

data.name: default_values_min_error
data.value: Max value should be higher than Min value

data.name: default_values_max_error
data.value: Max value should be higher than Min value

data.name: info_credits_text
data.value: OOTT for Android is made possible with several open source libraries

data.name: error_atLeastOneItemInDrawer
data.value: You need at least one item in the drawer

data.name: check_for_update
data.value: Would you like us to check for OOTT system updates?

data.value: While your server is updating this app will not function properly.

data.value: Please wait while we check if your server is ready to update

data.value: Please wait while the server is being updated.

data.name: update_not_started_unknown_error
data.value: Update not started due to an unknown error

data.value: Click here to update your server

data.value: Speech is not supported on this device

data.value: Give this Speech Command a proper name.

data.name: Speech_disabled
data.value: Speech Command disabled, please setup via settings.

data.name: noSwitchSelected_explanation_Speech
data.value: For Speech Command to have effect, a switch should be linked

data.name: error_logs
data.value: Could not find any logs to show

data.value: לא היתה אפשרות לקבל את נתוני יומן רישום עבור

data.name: welcome_info_domoticz
data.value: OOTT is a Home Automation System that lets you monitor and configure various devices like: Lights, Switches, various sensors/meters like Temperature, Rain, Wind, UV, Electra, Gas, Water and much more. Notifications/Alerts can be sent to any mobile device.

data.name: welcome_info_swipe
data.value: Swipe to the right or use the navigation buttons at the bottom to continue

data.name: welcome_info_settings1
data.value: The next page is for your OOTT settings.

data.name: welcome_info_settings2
data.value: You can specify a local and a remote server setting. The local settings are for when you are connected to your home wifi network. Remote settings are used when not connected to your home wifi network or when connected to cellular data (2G, 3G, 4G etc).

data.name: welcome_msg_connectionDataInvalid
data.value: URL should not start with http

data.name: welcome_msg_correctOnPreviousPage
data.value: Please correct the data on the previous page

data.name: welcome_local_server_used_switch_summary
data.value: Use different address for local connection

data.name: welcome_advancedSettings_summary
data.value: Only used for non-standard OOTT servers

data.name: welcome_local_server_directory
data.value: Local directory (leave empty if not used)

data.name: welcome_local_server_username
data.value: Local username (leave empty if not used)

data.name: welcome_local_server_password
data.value: Local password (leave empty if not used)

data.name: failed_to_get_securitypanel
data.value: No security panel found under your switches

data.name: wizard_welcome_description
data.value: OOTT is a very light weight home automation system that lets you monitor and configure various devices.

data.name: wizard_favorites_description
data.value: You can add devices to the Dashboard by saving them as favorites. Long click an item to save them as favorite!

data.name: wizard_startup_description
data.value: You can set your startup screen in the settings!

data.name: wizard_notifications_description
data.value: You can now receive Notifications on your Android device! Change the way how notifications behave in the settings

data.name: wizard_multiserver_description
data.value: You can configure multiple OOTT servers in the settings.

data.name: wizard_geo_description
data.value: You can set your startup screen in the settings!

data.name: wizard_wear_description
data.value: You can specify which switches you would like to control from your Android wear device!

data.name: wizard_auto_description
data.value: Receive the OOTT notifications right on your Android Auto device!

data.name: wizard_graph_description
data.value: You can see the history graph of an Utility, Weather or Temperature!

data.name: wizard_filter_description
data.value: You can filter devices per status (on/off). Check the right upper menu icon for filtering!

data.name: wizard_widgets_description
data.value: You can put some widgets on your home screen!

data.name: wizard_menuitem_description
data.value: You can now remove this Wizard from the navigation menu!

data.name: wizard_nfc_description
data.value: You are able to toggle switches via NFC!

data.name: wizard_qrcode_description
data.value: Toggle switches by scanning a QR Code (or barcode)!

data.name: wizard_speech_description
data.value: Toggle switches with your voice! Configure speech commands via the settings screens and connect switches.
